    Paul-Reftu

    • Constructor Detail

      • ARGProcessor

        public ARGProcessor(java.sql.Connection conn,
                    java.lang.String schedulePath,
                    java.lang.String planPath)
             throws JSONResourceException
        construct the JSON resource objects w.r.t the Building Plan and the Working Schedule
        Parameters:
        conn - the Connection object holding information w.r.t our current database connection
        schedulePath - the path to the JSON resource representing our schedule
        planPath - the path to the JSON resource representing our building plan
        Throws:
        JSONResourceException - when the JRDecoder object fails the decoding process o the schedule

    • Method Detail

      • processRequest

        public void processRequest(java.lang.String request)
                    throws JSONResourceException,
                           java.sql.SQLException
        process the given request (which is related to the Building Plan, the Working Schedule and/or certain operations on them)
        Parameters:
        request - the request to be processed
        Throws:
        JSONResourceException - upon unknown request w.r.t the working schedule or the building plan resource, upon invalid JSON resource or decoding failure
        java.sql.SQLException - upon failed database DML operations
